item.description:
Robin Hood Springtime Festival (i.e. a Ren Faire)

Info and tickets: http://robinhoodsfaire.com/ticket-info/#.UWAJ4pNJNAI

 

$16 - Adult, $10 - Youth, Children under 6 = free

 

Optional: Feast of the Merry - Saturday - Adult 18+ ONLY!

MAY 18 | 1:30 – 3:30pm INCLUDES FAIRE ADMISSION and COMMEMORATIVE GLASS! Join your hosts, Robin Hood and Maid Marion, for two delicious hours of food, friends, and laughter at this one-weekend-only special event! Our kitchens will delight you with a lavish multi-course meal hot from the oven. While you dine the best entertainment the festival has to offer will perform original material not seen at the faire itself. Funny, raunchy, and frequently unexpected, the Feast of the Merry is a sure hit with world-class entertainment. Seating for this event is limited to 60 guests so order your tickets TODAY! A cash bar will also be available. Complimentary Glass must be picked up on the day of the event. Adults only - 18+  ($69.57 including fees)

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Robin Hood Springtime Festival
